translation.en: I always wanted to be a dad. It just took 46 years for it to happen.

translation.en: Ah, there she is. Leah.

translation.en: Got the second one in the oven, and she still looks great.

translation.en: According to her, the reason I got such a late start

translation.en: I'm just gonna make sure my kids are prepared for whatever this world has to offer.

translation.en: -[Colin] No! -Hey, hey, hey!
Jesus!

translation.en: [Jack] This is the company my friends and I started 23 years ago.

translation.en: We make high-end throwback jerseys.

translation.en: But I got talked into selling the company

translation.en: so I could afford to send my son to private school,

translation.en: Must have been sewn by the gods.

translation.en: This company is now a gender-neutral, carbon-neutral, 21st-century lifestyle apparel brand.
translation.zh: 现在 我们 是 一个   性别 中立   碳中 和   属于 21世纪 的

translation.en: 21st-century lifestyle apparel brand.

translation.en: And the first step in that is to liberate everyone born before 1988.

translation.en: [woman] For what? All of us?

translation.en: -[Mike] Calm down, man. -[Jack] You calm down.

translation.en: -[man] Let's go. -Damien's 35? Goddamn, he looks good.
translation.zh: - 走 吧   - 达 米安 35 岁 了 ？ 该死 他 保养 得 真 好

translation.en: Hey, what happened to two weeks' notice? You can't just kick 'em out.

translation.en: Don't touch me.

translation.en: Look, we are living in an exponential era.

translation.en: Hmm. Jack, change and growth, these things happen faster than they did

translation.en: when you were young.

translation.en: I mean, look at me.

translation.en: I'm 28 years old, and I've already worked for 15 different start-ups.

translation.en: -Is that something you wanna brag about? -[Aspen] Absolutely.

translation.en: Success does not care about the way that you feel.

translation.en: I want people to come in here with a smile on their face,

translation.en: but I need them to have Kevlar in their souls.

translation.en: If that's too much to ask,

translation.en: then I don't care how long you've been here.

translation.en: You're gonna be out the door.

translation.en: She's an old friend of my mom. She has had a lot of success

translation.en: helping people in your situation to restrain their aggressive tendencies.

translation.en: "I appreciate you." "I appreciate you."

translation.en: Fucking sociopath hipster douche.

translation.en: Gonna threaten me in my own goddamn building?

translation.en: Come on! I'm gonna be late.

translation.en: Just fucking sitting there.

translation.en: -[car horn honks] -Get over!

translation.en: What's he doing now? Is he freestyling? Is he making a YouTube video?

translation.en: Where you going, you little cocksucker, huh?

translation.en: What?

translation.en: When was the last time you saw one of those bastards stop at a stop sign?

translation.en: Then they get hit and frost the thing like some unforeseen tragedy happened.

translation.en: Am I wrong?

translation.en: Yes.

translation.en: Toxic.

translation.en: Unbelievable.

translation.en: 500 people come here every day, and they got 20 fucking spots.

translation.en: How much money do you have to pay to get a parking lot?

translation.en: What does that say?

translation.en: Eh, fuck it. Be in and out.

translation.en: So, you are reading to your kids every night?

translation.en: [woman] Uh, we do 17--

translation.en: Oh, excuse me. Excuse me, sir?

translation.en: Yeah?

translation.en: -You were late for pickup. -I'm sorry. There was no parking spots.

translation.en: Ah! What's up? What's up?

translation.en: -I've missed you, man. -Me too.

translation.en: Of course it is.

translation.en: Okay.

translation.en: -Here's five bucks. It's all I got. -Oh, no. The first violation is free.
translation.zh: - 这是 五 块钱   我 就 这么 多 了   - 不用 了   第一 次 违反 不 需要 交 钱

translation.en: Really? Well, why didn't you tell me that before I put my kid down?

translation.en: I wouldn't have to tell you anything.

translation.en: -Is there, like, a problem here, miss? -Well, actually--

translation.en: you take me aside in private, and you talk to me.

translation.zh: 在 “ 小小 心灵 ”   我们 相信   教育 的 义务 应该 延展 到 家庭

translation.en: And once again, you'd know that if you'd picked up the guidebook and--

translation.en: Jesus Christ! I read the goddamn fucking guidebook!

translation.en: All right, you stumpy little cunt?

translation.en: Wow!

translation.en: Oh my God.

translation.en: Let's go, Nate.

translation.en: Hey, buddy, was that good?

translation.en: Ah, you're the best. Here. Let's get you cleaned up real quick. Buh-buh-buh-buh-buh. Doop-doop-doop-doop-doop.

translation.en: Yep, okay, cool.

translation.en: All right. Nothing but happiness when we go in there, okay? Awesome.

translation.en: Mommy!

translation.en: -Hey, how was your meeting, honey? -Oh, it was good! How was pickup?

translation.en: [Jack] Oh, it was great, smooth, uneventful.

translation.zh: 嘿   你 想 看 《 汪汪 一对 宝 》 吗 ？

translation.zh: - 《 汪汪 一对 宝 》 ！   - 《 汪汪 一对 宝 》 赞 ！

translation.en: [Leah clears throat] Jack. Uneventful? I just got off the phone with Doctor Lois Shmieckel-Turner.

translation.en: Oh boy.

translation.en: What is uneventful about calling Nate's principal a stumpy "C"?

translation.en: If you saw the way she was talking to me, it was a perfectly normal response.

translation.en: -For who? -Anyone with a shred of dignity.

translation.en: [whispers] Keep it down.

translation.en: [whispers] Anyone with a shred of dignity.

translation.en: for showing up a minute and a half late for pickup.

translation.en: Do you know how powerful Doctor Lois Shmieckel-Turner is?

translation.en: Her kindergarten recommendation

translation.en: makes or breaks whether he gets into The Meadows.

translation.en: Great. So we'll send him to a different private school.

translation.en: [whispers] That one was that bad. And you said it was that bad. Okay?

translation.en: Oh, Jesus Christ with the fucking data! Your generation and the data.

translation.en: Not having your every need catered to is actually a good thing.

translation.zh: - 我 上 的 就是 公立 学校   结果 好 得 很 呢   - 你 就是 在 那里 学 说话 的 ？

translation.en: No, it's where I learned to stick up for myself.

translation.en: You need to fix this. And you need to talk to someone about your anger.

translation.en: Go ahead, white-knuckle it through this world.

translation.en: and you are going to apologize.

translation.en: Good, fine. You think I'm afraid of that? I'll go down there right now.

translation.en: Great. She's not the first person I ever called that word.

translation.en: Don't worry. I'll smooth it right over.

translation.en: Jack, Leah. Thanks so much for coming.

translation.en: Thank you so much for meeting with us, honestly.

translation.en: Yes. Doctor Shmieckel-Turner, I… I just wanted to--

translation.en: -[Jack] Oh, okay. -[Lois] Uh…
translation.zh: 好 吧

translation.en: Oh, wait, wait. Whoa, whoa.

translation.en: We're gonna do this in front of the whole school? -[chuckles nervously] -Um…
translation.zh: 我们 要 在 全 校 人 的 面前 说 吗 ？

translation.en: We view this more as a village than a school.
translation.zh: 与其说 是 一 所 学校   我们 更 倾向于 认为 这是 一个 村落

translation.en: And we firmly believe in the practice of restorative justice, or gacaca.
translation.zh: 我们 坚定 地 崇尚   恢复性 司法   或者说 盖卡卡 法庭

translation.en: A common practice in Rwanda which was especially effective
translation.zh: 一 种 在 卢旺达 很 常见 的 操作   尤其 在 他们 的 屠杀 事件 后

translation.en: in the aftermath of their genocide.
translation.zh: 格外 有效

translation.en: And please, join the other parents.
translation.zh: 请 加入 到 其他 家长 中间 去 吧

translation.en: Oh. Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Okay. Wow! [chuckles]
translation.zh: 好 吧   哇 ！

translation.en: That's quite a turnout.
translation.zh: 来 的 人 真 不少 啊

translation.en: Um… All right, um…
translation.zh: 好 吧

translation.en: I guess, uh, looking back, I, uh, let my emotions get the best of me yesterday,
translation.zh: 我 想   我 反思 了 一下   昨天 我 确实 没 控制 好 我 的 情绪

translation.en: and, um, I wish I could have chosen my words a little bit differently.
translation.zh: 我 希望 当时 我 能 在 用词 上 稍作 调整

translation.en: All right?
translation.zh: 好 吧 ？

translation.en: And I am sorry that six of you heard this and then told the other 40.
translation.zh: 我 很 抱歉 你们 之中 的 六 位 听见 了   然后 告诉 了 剩下 的 40 人

translation.en: And, uh, to any of the children that heard what I said,
translation.zh: 对 听到 我 的话 的 孩子们   我 想 说

translation.en: it's never okay to say those words, okay?
translation.zh: 永远 都 不 可以 说 那些 话

translation.en: I… I was very, very wrong. All right?
translation.zh: 我 的 行为 非常 非常 的 错   好 吗 ？

translation.en: So that's it. Have a nice morning and, uh, keep using those paper straws.
translation.zh: 就 这样 了   祝 大家 有 个 美好 的 早晨   继续 使用 纸 吸管 吧

translation.en: I know they get soggy, but they're good for the turtles, evidently.
translation.zh: 我 知道 它们 会 变软   但 很 显然 它们 对 乌龟 有 好处

translation.en: -Thank you. -Okay. No, no. Jack. Jack. Jack.
translation.zh: 等 会   杰克

translation.en: Yeah. We… we appreciate the words,
translation.zh: 嗯   我们 很 感激 你 刚刚 说 的 这些

translation.en: but the process of healing has only just begun.
translation.zh: 但是 疗愈 才 刚刚 开始

translation.en: -Yes, Judy. -[Judy] Yes, thank you.
translation.zh: - 朱迪   请 说   - 好的   谢谢

translation.en: Um, I would just like to voice how incredibly hurt I am.
translation.zh: 我 只 想 表达 我 有 多么 地 受伤

translation.en: Mr. Kelly, do you understand that using the C-word
translation.zh: 凯利 先生   你 知道 吗 ？   用 那个 词称 呼别人

translation.en: is like the N-word but for women?
translation.zh: 就 像 用 另 一个 不 好的 词   不过 对象 是 女人

translation.en: Oh yeah. Oh yeah. Yeah, I'm… I'm sure… I'm sure it is.
translation.zh: 哦 是的   没错   我 想 确实 是的

translation.en: You know, other than the 400 years of slavery and continued systemic oppression.
translation.zh: 除了 400年 的 奴隶制   和 延续 下来 的 系统性 压迫

translation.en: Other than that, I think you're making a really solid point.
translation.zh: 我 觉得 你 的 观点 非常 站 得 住 脚

translation.en: Yes, Mimi.
translation.zh: 咪咪   请 说

translation.en: Even though I wasn't there,
translation.zh: 即使 我 当时 不 在

translation.en: just knowing that language like that was used in front of the child--
translation.zh: 光 想想 那种 话 是 在 孩子 面 …

translation.en: Oh, Jesus Christ.
translation.zh: 要 了 亲命 了

translation.en: Please. Brian.
translation.zh: 布莱恩   请 说

translation.en: As a parent of a child and someone with chronically low metabolism,
translation.zh: 作为 孩子 的 家长   以及 一个 长期 代谢 低下 的 人

translation.en: but loving my body…
translation.zh: 但 仍然 爱 我 的 身体 …

translation.en: -Oh. Good for you, Brian. -Yeah.
translation.zh: 好样 的   布莱恩

translation.en: …your use of the word "stumpy" was a real trigger to me and my whole family.
translation.zh: … 你 用 了 “ 矮胖 ” 这个 词   真的 触痛 了 我 和 我们 全家

translation.en: Seriously?
translation.zh: 真的 假 的 ？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Any type of body-shaming just reminds me
translation.zh: 任何 形式 的 身材 羞辱 都会 让 我 想起

translation.en: of what it feels like to be told that my body ain't good enough.
translation.zh: 那种 被 人 说 我 的 身材 不够 好的 感觉

translation.en: [Jack] Oh, okay. All right. Well, I understand that, and I'm sorry I made you feel that way.
translation.zh: 好 吧   我 明白   我 很 抱歉 让 你 有 那样 的 感受 了

translation.en: And I'd also like to add, and I think a lot of you would agree,
translation.zh: 我 想 补充 一 句   我 觉得 你们 中 的 很多 人 都会 同意

translation.en: we do have a major weight problem in this country. Do we not, you know?
translation.zh: 就是 我们 国家   确实 面临 着 严重 的 体重 问题   对 吧 ？

translation.en: And it doesn't just affect this man and his child.
translation.zh: 而且 这 不仅仅 影响 了   这位 先生 和 他 的 孩子

translation.en: I mean, the burden that out-of-shape people put on our healthcare system,
translation.zh: 体型 不 佳 的 人   给 我们 的 医保 系统 带来 的 压力

translation.en: not to mention the loved ones they leave behind is…
translation.zh: 更 别 说 他们 病逝 后 对 亲友 的 打击 了 …

translation.en: it's truly, truly heartbreaking.
translation.zh: 是 真真切切 的 让 人 揪心 的

translation.en: And I… I think, as a community, we should be able to talk about it.
translation.zh: 我 觉得 我们 同 在 一个 社区   这是 个 我们 可以 一起 探讨 的 问题

translation.en: Like maybe put a salad bar at drop-off or something like that.
translation.zh: 比如说   我们 可以 在 接送 孩子 的 入口   设 一个 沙拉自助 之类 的

translation.en: Oh man! I would love that.
translation.zh: 哦天 ！ 我 喜欢 这个

translation.en: All right. Maybe… maybe not now.
translation.zh: 好 吧   可能 以后 再说

translation.en: Wrap it up. Thank you.
translation.zh: 让 我 赶紧 结束   好的 谢谢

translation.en: Uh, I'd just like to say that I am truly sorry for my actions yesterday.
translation.zh: 我 想 说 我 对 我 昨天 的 行为 深感 抱歉

translation.en: They have no place in this community. Okay? All right.
translation.zh: 那种 行为 在 我们 这里   是 绝不 容许 的   好 吧 ？ 就 这样

translation.en: I'm sorry. Have a nice morning. Good day.
translation.zh: 对不起   祝 你们 有 个 美好 的 早晨 和 愉快 的 一 天

translation.en: Okay. Okay, let's all thank Jack.
translation.zh: 好的   我们 感谢 杰克

translation.en: It's not easy to admit when we are wrong.
translation.zh: 当 我们 犯错 的 时候   能 承认 错误 是 很 不 容易 的

translation.en: This is going to be a long… a long journey.
translation.zh: 这 条 路 会 很 漫长

translation.en: But I know we will all be there to support him.
translation.zh: 但 我 知道 我们 都会 在 背后 支持 他

translation.en: What the fuck? What does she mean by "long journey"?
translation.zh: 什么鬼 ？   她 说 “ 漫长 的 道路 ” 是 什么 意思 ？

translation.en: The journey's over. I just apologized to her
translation.zh: 这 条 路 走 完了   我 给 她 道歉 了

translation.en: and a bunch of weak-kneed people who weren't even there.
translation.zh: 还有 那 一 群 怂 到家 的 人   那些 人 当时 压根 就 不 在

translation.en: She doesn't write Nate's recommendation for another three months.
translation.zh: 她 又 拖 了 三 个 月 才 肯给奈特 写 推荐 书

translation.en: -So? -So!
translation.zh: - 所以 呢 ？   - 所以 ！

translation.en: You have a long time to prove to her that you are a good dad.
translation.zh: 你 有 很多 时间   来 向 她 证明 你 是 个 好 父亲

translation.en: But why do I need to do that?
translation.zh: 但 我 为什么 要 这么 做 ？

translation.en: Because this recommendation is as much about Nate as it is about us as parents.
translation.zh: 因为 这个 推荐 书 关系 到 奈特   也 会 关系 到 我们

translation.en: Oh, Jesus Christ! Is it ever over with these people?
translation.zh: 天啊 ！ 这些 人 到底 有 完 没完 ？

translation.en: I mean, how many fucking hoops do you have to jump through?
translation.zh: 你 得 闯 多少 个关 才能 通过 啊 ？

translation.en: I don't know, Jack, but you created this problem.
translation.zh: 我 不 知道   杰克   但 这是 你 制造 的 问题

translation.en: So, are you going to man up and solve it, or am I registering for two pacifiers?
translation.zh: 所以 你 是 要 像 个 男人 一样 解决 它   还是 我 得 给 你 也 买 个 奶嘴 了 ？

translation.en: -Well? -All right.
translation.zh: - 怎么样 ？   - 好 吧

translation.en: I will play nice, and I will jump through all the hoops, okay?
translation.zh: 我 会 好好 的   然后 闯 过 每个 关卡   好 吗 ？

translation.en: Mm-hmm. Thank you. Have a good day.
translation.zh: 谢谢   祝 你 今天 愉快

translation.en: Hi, baby. I grilled up some buffalo steaks,
translation.zh: 嗨宝贝   我 烤 了 一点 水牛 牛排

translation.en: and there's a Manhattan waiting for you on the table.
translation.zh: 桌子 上 还有 一 杯 曼哈顿 鸡尾酒 等 着 你

translation.en: -Goddamn, baby. You look good. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 真 要 命宝贝   你 看起来 好赞

translation.en: [Britney] Follow me.
translation.zh: 跟 我 来

translation.en: [Mike] Just what I needed tonight.
translation.zh: 正是 我 今晚 需要 的

translation.en: Well, I do know how to take care of my man.
translation.zh: 当然   我 知道 怎么 照顾 我 的 男人

translation.en: -[Mike chuckles] -Go on. Sit down.
translation.zh: 去 吧   坐下

translation.en: Have a drink. Get all nice and relaxed.
translation.zh: 喝 一 杯   好好 放松 一下

translation.en: Why? What happened?
translation.zh: 为什么 ？ 怎么 了 ？

translation.en: Nothing.
translation.zh: 没 什么

translation.en: Okay, well, I do have to tell you something, but you have to promise to not get mad.
translation.zh: 好 吧   确实 有事 要 跟 你 说   但 你 保证 你 不 能 生气

translation.en: I went to too many years of law school to agree to something like that.
translation.zh: 我 学 了 这么 多年 法律   让 我 没法 轻易 答应 这种 事 呢

translation.en: What's going on?
translation.zh: 怎么 了 ？

translation.en: Well,
translation.zh: 嗯

translation.en: I'm late.
translation.zh: 延迟 了

translation.en: There's no way. That's impossible.
translation.zh: 不 会 吧   不 可能

translation.en: I couldn't believe it either.
translation.zh: 我 也 不 敢 相信

translation.en: I had a vasectomy, and I pull out.
translation.zh: 我 结扎 了   而且 我 是 出来 了 才射 的

translation.en: I… I know. I don't know how it happened, but…
translation.zh: 我 知道   我 也 不 懂 是 怎么 回 事   但 …

translation.en: maybe there's a reason.
translation.zh: 也许 是 有 其他 原因

translation.en: Pee again.
translation.zh: 再 尿 一 次

translation.en: -What? -Pee again!
translation.zh: - 什么 ？   - 再 尿 一 次 ！

translation.en: I did. Three times.
translation.zh: 我 尿 了 三 次 呢

translation.en: Well, it's not mine, so go take a test.
translation.zh: 那 就 不是 我 的   去 验 一下 吧

translation.en: I mean, look at it this way. You got really strong sperm.
translation.zh: 你 得 这么 想   这 说明 你 的 精子 真的 很 强大

translation.en: You should be proud.
translation.zh: 你 应该 感到 骄傲

translation.en: Seriously. I mean, guys our age, our cum is usually, like, asthmatic, you know,
translation.zh: 真的   我们 这个 年纪 的 男人   射 出来 的 东西 都 跟 得 了 哮喘病 一样

translation.en: but your shit's, like, Bruce Willis in Unbreakable, bro.
translation.zh: 但 你 的 就 像   《 不 死 劫 》 里 的 布鲁斯·威利斯

translation.en: Yeah. To plow through a vasectomy with pre-cum.
translation.zh: 对 啊   靠着性 前液 艰难 地 闯 过 了 结扎

translation.en: -I mean, that's unheard of. -Come on.
translation.zh: - 这 真是 罕见   - 可不是 嘛

translation.en: That's like some Braveheart-level jizz.
translation.zh: 那 简直 是 《 勇敢 的 心 》 级别 的 精液 了

translation.en: Yeah, dude. You're like a Black William Wallace.
translation.zh: 兄弟   你 真是   黑人版 的 威廉·华莱士 了

translation.en: [shouts] Pre-cum!
translation.zh: 性 前液 ！

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.zh: 不好意思

translation.en: Mike, this is gonna be great, okay? And remember, kids keep you young.
translation.zh: 迈克   会 很 赞 的   有 了 小孩 之后 你 会 觉得 自己 很 年轻

translation.en: No, they don't. My kids almost killed me.
translation.zh: 不 会 的   我 的 孩子 让 我 觉得 想 死

translation.en: [Jack] Oh, come on.
translation.zh: 别 这么 想

translation.en: Don't you remember the beauty of becoming a dad?
translation.zh: 你 难道 忘 了 当 爸爸 时 的 那种 美妙 吗 ？

translation.en: The smell of a newborn baby's head. I mean, it's the best.
translation.zh: 新生 婴儿 头 上 的 味道   简直 太 棒 了

translation.en: They're funny, Mike. They're funny.
translation.zh: 他们 很 有意思 的   迈克

translation.en: They say funny shit. They think farts are funny.
translation.zh: 他们 会 说 有趣 的话   他们 觉得 屁 都 是 有趣 的

translation.en: In the morning, he comes running in. "Pull my finger. Pull my finger."
translation.zh: 早上 他 跑 进来 说 “ 拉 我 的 手指 ”

translation.en: -Wet one. It's funny. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 一个 湿屁   太 逗 了

translation.en: It's adorable.
translation.zh: 很 可爱

translation.en: Another thing, you come home, they're excited to see you.
translation.zh: 还有   你 回到 家   他们 见到 你 超级 激动 的

translation.en: How many places do you walk in, and people just freak out
translation.zh: 有 几 个 地方 你 可以 一 进门   就 有人 像 疯 了 一样

translation.en: and start running at you, screaming your name?
translation.zh: 向 你 跑来   尖叫 着 喊 你 的 名字 ？

translation.en: You come home, you feel like you're famous.
translation.zh: 你 回到 家   感觉 自己 成 巨星 了

translation.en: Yeah, exactly. They don't die after 12 years. -Exactly. -Like a dog. Hopefully.
translation.zh: 没错   而且 他们 不 会 活 了 12年 就 死 了   像 狗 一样   希望 是 这样

translation.en: Mike, this is gonna be great. We all get to do it together.
translation.zh: 迈克   这 会 很 棒 的   而且 我们 会 一起 帮 你

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Jack, you've aged ten years since Nate was born.
translation.zh: 杰克   自从 奈特 出生 后   你 老 了 十 岁

translation.en: Connor, I don't know what's up with you 'cause you don't fucking age.
translation.zh: 康纳   我 不 知道 你 是 怎么 了   因为 你 一点 没 老

translation.en: -Thanks, buddy. -[Mike] It's not a compliment.
translation.zh: - 谢 了   兄弟   - 我 不是 夸 你

translation.en: I don't know what kind of Botox shit you're on,
translation.zh: 我 不 知道 你 打 了 什么 肉毒杆菌

translation.en: but it's gonna kill you.
translation.zh: 会 毒死 你 的

translation.en: All right, dude. Ease up. Okay? I didn't fucking get you pregnant.
translation.zh: 好 吧 兄弟   别 这么 恶毒   好 吗 ？   你 搞出 小孩 又 不是 因为 我

translation.en: Just… If you don't want the baby, just get an abortion.
translation.zh: 就 … 如果 你 不 想 要   堕胎 就 完了

translation.en: Flush it.
translation.zh: 冲掉

translation.en: [scoffs] I don't believe in that. That's some white shit.
translation.zh: 我 不 信 这个   这是 白人 做 的 垃圾 事

translation.en: -What's that mean? -What?
translation.zh: - 什么 意思 ？   - 什么 ？

translation.en: I don't know. I'm emotional.
translation.zh: 我 不 知道   我 有点 激动 了

translation.en: She said she didn't wanna have kids.
translation.zh: 她 说 了 她 不 想 要 孩子

translation.en: What the fuck am I gonna do?
translation.zh: 我 现在 该 怎么办 ？

translation.en: -I'm having a heart attack. -You're not.
translation.zh: - 我 心脏病 要 发 了   - 你 不 会 的

translation.en: -Can we get some water? Just breathe. -I'm gonna have a heart attack.
translation.zh: - 能 给 我们 来 点 水 吗 ？ 注意 呼吸   - 我 心脏病 要 发 了

translation.en: You're not gonna have a heart attack. You go to the gym.
translation.zh: 你 不 会 心脏病 发作 的   你 是 健身 的 人

translation.en: Nobody has a heart attack that goes to the gym.
translation.zh: 没有 哪个 健身 的 人 会 心脏病 发作 的

translation.en: Except… Remember that jogging guy? He died of a heart attack.
translation.zh: 除了 慢跑 那 家伙   他 就 死于 心脏病

translation.en: -Oh, yeah. Yeah. -Remember that guy?
translation.zh: - 对 哦   - 记得 那个 人 吗 ？

translation.en: [Lois] Good morning, everyone. Morning, Doctor L.
translation.zh: - 大家 早上 好   - 早上 好   L 博士

translation.en: -Oh! -[Jack] Hey, buddy. [kisses] I'll see ya. Have fun. Okay?
translation.zh: 回头 见   小家伙   要 开心 哦   好 吗 ？

translation.en: Is that for me?
translation.zh: 那 是 给 我 的 吗 ？

translation.en: Oh, it's for the whole community. Yeah, it's an olive tree.
translation.zh: 是 给 整个 社区 的   这是 一 棵 橄榄 树

translation.en: Very drought-friendly. And an eternal symbol of peace.
translation.zh: 很 耐旱   也 是 和平 的 永恒 象征

translation.en: I thought it'd be a nice way to cultivate the kids', uh, social-emotional growth.
translation.zh: 想 着 这是 一个   培养 孩子们 的 社会 心理 健康 的 好 方法

translation.en: Something we work on a lot with Nate at home, you know?
translation.zh: 这是 我们 在 家里 对 奈特 一再 强调 的 事

translation.en: Well, I… I am impressed.
translation.zh: 令 我 刮目相看

translation.en: But this tree is incompatible with our ecosystem.
translation.zh: 但 这 棵 树   跟 我们 这里 的 生态 系统 不是 很 兼容

translation.en: The insects that it would attract
translation.zh: 它 会 招来 虫子

translation.en: would be detrimental to all plant life here.
translation.zh: 那些 虫子   会 对 这里 的 植物 产生 有害 的 影响

translation.en: -This is a funny moment. -[Jack laughs] Yeah. You and I are having a--
translation.zh: 真 有意思 啊   你 和 我 竟然 在 …

translation.en: [laughs] What?
translation.zh: 什么 ？

translation.en: I find it so apropos that you have brought the plant version of yourself.
translation.zh: 真是 巧 了   你 竟然 带 了 一个   跟 你 一样 的 植物   一个 植物版 的 你

translation.en: Jack, I appreciate the effort. I know how hard this is for you.
translation.zh: 杰克   我 很 感谢 你 能 这么 做   我 知道 这 对 你 来说 不 容易

translation.en: But fortunately, I am here to guide you.
translation.zh: 但 幸好 你 有 我 来 为 你 指路

translation.en: If you're willing to take my advice. Is that something you'd be open to?
translation.zh: 如果 你 愿意 采纳 我 的 建议   这是 你 能 接受 的 事 吗 ？

translation.en: -I need a verbal confirmation. -Yes.
translation.zh: - 我 需要 你 用 语言 确认   - 是的

translation.en: Walk with me.
translation.zh: 跟 我 来

translation.en: As you can see, this is such a dynamic and whimsical place.
translation.zh: 如 你 所 见   这是 一个 充满 活力   随性 灵动 的 地方

translation.en: [man] Oh, excuse me, sir.

translation.en: You can't smoke out here.

translation.en: Well, what are you doing?

translation.en: Uh, I'm… I'm vaping.

translation.en: What's the difference?

translation.en: The difference is people can't smell what I'm doing from ten blocks away.
translation.zh: 区别 在于   我 不 会 让 人   老远 就 闻到 我 在 干 的 事情

translation.en: All right. Well, I can see what you're doing. It's called smoking.

translation.en: So, till you put yours out, I'm not putting mine out. How about that?

translation.en: I don't mean to pull rank here, but this is my hotel.

translation.en: Motel.
translation.zh: 汽车 旅馆

translation.en: -What? -It's a motel.

translation.en: Open courtyard. A serial killer can walk right up to my door, man.

translation.en: If this was a hotel, he'd have to go through a lobby first.

translation.en: It's a motel. So, why don't you get off your high horse, huh?

translation.en: Hey, quick question. Uh, what the fuck is your problem?

translation.en: What's my problem? My problem is I live in a world

translation.en: where a guy who's smoking is telling me I can't smoke, all right?

translation.en: That, in a nutshell, is my problem.

translation.en: Well, in a nutshell, it's not smoking.

translation.en: What makes it smoking, buddy,

translation.en: is the fucking smoke coming out of your mouth, all right?

translation.en: So, get out of my fucking face before I throw you in that fucking pool?

translation.en: I don't respond to hyperbole!

translation.en: -Good. I don't know what that means. -If you want an ass-kicking, keep talking.
translation.zh: - 很 好   我 不 知道 你 在 说 什么   - 你 想 挨揍 的话 就 继续 说 吧

translation.en: Oh! "Hyperbole"! I got big hotel words.

translation.en: Oh, absolutely, yeah. And it's ruining this country.

translation.en: What? I don't want motherfuckers tracking me!

translation.en: Man, nobody gives a shit where you are. Get on! Come on! Come on!

translation.en: -All right! -[Connor] Christ!

translation.en: Whoo! These things are awesome. These fucking things are awesome!

translation.en: Share the road!

translation.en: -We're gonna lead! [laughs] -Whoa! Whoa!

translation.en: Go, go, go!
translation.zh: 快 ！

translation.en: Maternity? Maternity?

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Jack?

translation.en: That's a good move.

translation.en: I missed it?

translation.en: I fucking missed it. I missed it.
translation.zh: 我 他妈的 错过 了   我 错过 了

translation.en: Daddy!
translation.zh: 爸爸 ！

translation.en: Hey, buddy, how are you?

translation.en: Daddy, I have a baby sister.

translation.en: Yes, you do.

translation.en: -[sobs] -Are you crying?

translation.en: [sobs] A little bit. A little bit.

translation.en: Why?

translation.en: [sniffles] 'Cause I messed up, buddy. I messed up. I messed up.
translation.zh: 因为 我 搞 砸 了   小家伙   我 搞 砸 了

translation.en: It's okay. Rub some dirt on it.
translation.zh: 没关系   抹点 土 就 行 了

translation.en: Yeah, rub some dirt on it, right? [sniffles] You're the best, buddy.
translation.zh: 是 啊   抹点 土 对 吗 ？   你 是 最 棒 的   小家伙

translation.en: No, you're the best.
translation.zh: 不   你 是 最 棒 的

translation.en: Jack, you wanna pull yourself together and come meet your daughter?

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: -Hey, I got you these. -[baby cries]
translation.zh: 这是 给 你 的

translation.en: She's beautiful. Here. Here, princess.
translation.zh: 她 很 漂亮   来 吧   小 公主

translation.en: Just a second. No skin-to-skin with the glitter.

translation.en: Oh. Yeah, right.

translation.en: Listen, Leah, I know you're super pissed at me. -And you have every right to be. -[tape tearing]

translation.en: Okay, but I want you to know I love you to death.

translation.en: And I'm so sorry I let things get the way they did between us.

translation.en: I know I have a lot of work to do, but I want you to know

translation.en: I'm not gonna spread my anger onto these kids,

translation.en: and you're not gonna have to deal with it anymore.
translation.zh: 你 也 不 需要 再 面对 这些 了

translation.en: I'm going to get help, all right?
translation.zh: 我 会 去 找 人 看看 的   好 吗 ？

translation.en: I'm seeking help from a professional.
translation.zh: 我 要 找 个 专业 人士

translation.en: And you came to this realization at a strip club?
translation.zh: 你 是 在 一个 脱衣舞 俱乐部 想通 的 吗 ？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Yes, I did.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Probably another reason I need to go to therapy.

translation.en: For what it's worth, I got my first appointment on Tuesday.

translation.en: You're really lucky we make beautiful babies.
translation.zh: 你 很 幸运   我们 的 宝宝 都 那么 可爱

translation.en: Yeah. Can I see her?

translation.en: -Yeah. -Okay.
translation.zh: - 可以   - 好的

translation.en: -Meet your daddy. -Hey, princess. Hey.
translation.zh: - 这是 你 的 爸爸   - 你好 呀   小 公主

translation.en: Am I gonna have to move the Kleenex to your side of the bed?
translation.zh: 我 需要 把 纸巾 拿到 你 那边 吗 ？

translation.en: [chuckles] Yeah, probably.
translation.zh: 应该 是 吧

translation.en: Look at those eyes.
translation.zh: 看看 那 双 眼睛

translation.en: Hey. Oh my God.
translation.zh: 嘿   我 的 天

translation.en: She's beautiful. Look at you.
translation.zh: 她 真 漂亮   看 啊

translation.en: What are we gonna call her?
translation.zh: 我们 给 她 取 个 什么 名字 呢 ？

translation.en: -I was thinking-- -[Cara] Where's your fucking ring?
translation.zh: - 我 在 想 …   - 你 的 婚戒 哪儿 去 了 ？

translation.en: Oh yeah. It's probably somewhere, like, in my lower intestine.

translation.en: Your wedding ring is inside your body right now?

translation.en: -It's metal. It'll pass. -[Connor] Yeah.
translation.zh: - 是 金属 的   会 拉 出来 的   - 对

translation.en: What the fuck, Connor?
translation.zh: 搞 什么 啊   康纳 ？

translation.en: Okay, okay, okay. Let's take that outside.
translation.zh: 好 了   请 去 外面 说 吧

translation.en: In fact, anyone who is not an immediate member of the family, out.

translation.en: [Mike] Here we go.
translation.zh: 来 吧

translation.en: You guys made a beautiful baby.
translation.zh: 宝宝 很 可爱

translation.en: Thank you, Mike.
translation.zh: 谢谢 你   迈克

translation.en: So…
translation.zh: 所以 …

translation.en: Is there anything you wanna tell me about your little trip?
translation.zh: 关于 你们 的 这次 旅行   你 有 什么 要 告诉 我 的 吗 ？

translation.en: Nope. [inhales deeply] I'm good. [exhales]
translation.zh: 没有   都 挺 好的

translation.en: No more Hella Mike.
translation.zh: 没有 大家伙 迈克 了

translation.en: Who's Hella Mike?
translation.zh: 谁 是 大家伙 迈克 ？

translation.en: I don't really know.
translation.zh: 我 其实 并 不 知道

translation.en: But I do know that he made some decisions over the last 17 hours,
translation.zh: 但 我 知道 在 过去 的 17年 里   他 做 了 一些 人生 选择

translation.en: and I don't like how things turned out.
translation.zh: 我 并 不 喜欢 那些 选择 带来 的 结果

translation.en: But just know that I love you and…
translation.zh: 但 你 只要 知道 我 爱 你   还有 …

translation.en: I mean, you know, there's a lot of crazy shit going on in the news.
translation.zh: 你 知道 的   新闻 里 全 是 疯狂 的 事情

translation.en: And it's not just the booze talking, but I just fucking…
translation.zh: 我 不是 在 说 醉话   我 就是 …

translation.en: Britney, would you do me the honor of becoming my bride?
translation.zh: 布兰妮   你 愿意 给 我 这 份 荣幸   成为 我 的 新娘 吗 ？

translation.en: Michael Jahim Richards.
translation.zh: 迈克尔·贾希姆·理查兹

translation.en: I am not answering that question in the middle of a hospital!
translation.zh: 我 不要 在 医院 里 回答 这个 问题 ！

translation.en: -[Mike] My bad. -Get up! Jesus! Get up! Come on! Take a shower! Buy a ring! Show some effort!
translation.zh: - 是 我 不对   - 起来 ！ 天 啊   快 起来 ！

translation.en: Get up! Come on! Take a shower! Buy a ring! Show some effort!
translation.zh: 去 洗 个 澡   买 个 戒指   表现 一些 诚意 啊 ！

translation.en: At least take me to Tony Roma's or something.

translation.en: How about Ruth's Chris?
translation.zh: 茹丝 葵牛 排馆 怎么样 ？

translation.en: I mean, I do love Ruth's Chris.
translation.zh: 我 确实 喜欢 茹 丝葵

translation.en: -I'm just so sick of your fucking excuses. -What? It's not an excuse, Cara.
translation.zh: - 我 真是 受够 了 你 的 那些 该死 的 借口   - 这不 是 借口   卡拉

translation.en: I'm in actual fucking pain, which is something you can't relate to
translation.zh: 我 是 真的 很 痛苦   但 你 不 会 理解 的

translation.en: because you block it out with your cold, reptilian mindset.
translation.zh: 因为 你 用 你 那 冷血动物 一般 的   冷酷 思维 全部 隔绝 了

translation.en: You think I'm cold?
translation.zh: 你 觉得 我 很 冷酷 ？

translation.en: Babe, when you open your legs,

translation.en: I can actually hear the East German National Anthem.
translation.zh: 我 真的 能 听见 东德国 歌响 起来 了

translation.en: Finally, a little fucking emotion!
translation.zh: 终于 有 一点 情绪 了 ！

translation.en: Are you trying to tell me you don't wanna be with me anymore?

translation.en: No. No, babe.
translation.zh: 不是 的   宝贝

translation.en: I'm just telling you that I don't wanna live my life this way anymore.
translation.zh: 我 只是 想 告诉 你   我 不 想 再 这么 生活 下去 了

translation.en: I would like to be less afraid of you.
translation.zh: 我 不 想 再 害怕 你

translation.en: You know, and maybe not have every minute of my life scheduled.
